reviewText:
This is a nude art video, so it is meant to be sensual, not sexual.  Amanda is a very natural girl, someone who could be a college student next door.  But to answer the question probably on a lot of potential buyer's minds, yes there are many 'money shots', especially in the slide show portion.  What is seeming to be a problem with his videos is that while he uses fill flash for lighting, the video person's product suffers due to that, since the use of reflectorized light would be better to fill in shadows.  So rather then showing it is a professional production, it shows he is being cheap since it seems to be him, perhaps his wife, and the model as a group of three doing the filming.  And also, this gives rise to poor lighting exposures on Amanda in some of the scenes, where the color saturation jumps around, which is distracting.

In a way I felt sorry for Amanda.  It could not have been pleasant being barefoot in those areas, let alone lying down.  The forest and desert floors are not particularly soft on the feet.  And it was mentioned during the forest shoot, it was 65 degrees.  And in the desert, it seems there were insects around.

I can't comment as to whether, time-wise, one gets their money's worth.  She is beautiful, it is sensual, so one will have to decide if it is worth it.
Very uninspiring. Two stars for courage to the model

They were contents unsatisfactory as an image video.
Because he did not think that it would appreciate even by buying DVD, if it is as a slide show.

This DVD had a good chapter selection menu and you are able to see which chapter you are selecting to play. The DVD was about 70 minutes long, not the 2 hours on the video jacket. The DVD returned to the menu after the last chapter was played. The model had a lip piercing which distracts from her great looks.
